item.title: When someone uses an item on an npc, They get disconnected
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

When someone uses an item on an npc, They get disconnected. How do I fix that? Do I need to add the case for it and then do what to it?

Heres the case I put in to try and fix it, With no success:

case 57: // Use item on npc int readone = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int readtwo = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); int readthree = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int readfour = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); break;

2 years later and still no answer
